title: History to Chew On
description: Everybody loves chewing gum. But you probably never stop to think about how gum was invented or what it is made from. This book tells readers in a fun and engaging way who first chewed gum, where gum comes from, and how it is made. It even includes details about what people do with their gum when they're finished!
highFrequencyWords: cud, discard, latex, mesh, paraffin wax, sap, tacky, vat, wad
reviewWords: Use of vocabulary lessons requires a subscription to VocabularyA-Z.com.
comprehension: Commas                : Understand the use of commas in a series
awareness: Synonyms                : Understand and identify the use of synonyms
phonics:
Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
